author: Ewan Palmer
title: Family of First Child to Die From Coronavirus in Michigan Express Support for Governor Gretchen Whitmer's Lockdown
description: Five-year-old Skylar Herbert died from complications from the virus days after a mass protest against the lockdown took place outside the state capitol building.
content:
The family of a 5-year-old girl in Michigan who died after testing positive for the coronavirus has thanked Governor Gretchen Whitmer for implementing the state's "Stay Home, Stay Safe" order which has seen mass opposition.
